SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 15
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
15
NLP systems including
multilinguality: AGROVOC
• AGROVOC Thesaurus developed by the FAO (Food and 
Agriculture Organization) and the EU in 1980/1982. 
• Initially, 3 languages. Now, 10 languages. They want to 
include more.
• It is defined as “a multilingual structured and controlled 
vocabulary”. 
• Used to index and retrieve data about fisheries and food 
• It shows the amount of terms in real time (41,580 terms in 
Spanish)
–
URL http://www.fao.org/aims/ag_figures.jsp
speaker: SYSTEM
